lines.content: First, click the space where you want your dinosaur to start.
Time for some high-flying action folks!
The claw stars meet the prehistoric predators.

AddDinosToRopeUntilEqual.content: Add dinosaurs to the rope until the weight of your team
equals the weight of the other team!
Remember the most you can use is 4!

ClawStarsGetTheGold.content: The Claw Stars get the gold!

ClawStarsVs.content: It's the Claw Stars versus the Prehistoric Predators!

ClickToAddRemoveRope_mouse.content: Click on your dinosaurs to add them to the rope.
Click on them again to take them off the rope.

ClickToAddRemoveRope_touch.content: Tap the dinosaurs to add them to the rope.
Tap them again to take them off the rope.

IncorrectTooHeavy_mouse.content: Our team is too heavy, it needs less weight!
Click on a dinosaur to take him off the rope.
Remember you may also need to add
a smaller dinosaur to make it balanced.

IncorrectTooHeavy_touch.content: Our team is too heavy, it needs less weight!
Tap a dinosaur to take him off the rope.
Remember you may also need to add
a smaller dinosaur to make it balanced.

IncorrectTooLight.content: Our team is too light, it needs more weight!
Try changing the dinosaurs on the rope.

MostIs4.content: The most dinosaurs you can add to the rope is 4.

SmallWeighBigWeigh.content: In this game small dinosaurs weigh a little,
and big dinosaurs weigh a lot.
This means BIG dinosaurs weigh MORE than small dinosaurs

WeDidItOneRoundLeft.content: We did it!  There's one round left.

WeveGotToBeInBalance.content: We've got to be in balance with the other team.
Weight is a measure of how heavy something is.

YouKnowTheyAreEqualWhen.content: You'll know the two sides are equal
when the leaf is right above the dinosaur's head.
So close he can eat it!
